metadata.title: CVE-2018-6520 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: SimpleSAMLphp before 1.15.2 allows remote attackers to bypass an openredirect protection mechanism via crafted authority data in a URL.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
